channel.title: Client Freezes When I Spawn Torva [ PI ]
channel.description: Whenever i spawn torva "::item 20135 1" it just freezes my client and i cant reload it, and when i close it and re open i cant log on, i need to go into the source and remove the items in my inventory so i can log in.... i heard i needed to lower the Id for torva, but idk how to do that? :o any help would be great!, Thanks guys!

item.title: Client Freezes When I Spawn Torva [ PI ]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Go to your item command in your commands file or whatever and make sure the number listed is higher than that torva number.

Read full topic

did you added torva by yourself?

No, it was alreayd on the server when i downloaded it.

Whenever i spawn torva “::item 20135 1” it just freezes my client and i cant reload it, and when i close it and re open i cant log on, i need to go into the source and remove the items in my inventory so i can log in… i heard i needed to lower the Id for torva, but idk how to do that? :o any help would be great!, Thanks guys!
